AODCore.shader



struct Shader;
Allows you to implement GLSL shaders into the rendering of AoD

this(string vertex_file, string fragment_file = "", string tess_ctrl_file = "", string tess_eval_file = "", string compute_file = "");
Generates a GL Shader.

GLuint R_Shader_ID();
Returns the program/shader ID
